My research centers on **Corporate Finance** and the **Economics of Banking**. I aim to understand how risks propagate through the financial system and impact households and firms. I am interested in many topics of in corporate finance, particularly in how financial frictions influence firm behavior. Additionally, I seek to apply my knowledge and skill to explore intersections with other relevant topics such as climate change and artificial intelligence, among others.
